Html:
Hi All!

I use php 5.2, and I run the Test-files.
If run the 01simple.php the output is:
12:30:54 Create new PHPExcel object 12:30:54 Set properties 12:30:54 Add some data 12:30:54 Rename sheet 12:30:54 Write to Excel2007 format 12:30:54 Done writing file.

But I try read in Excel 2007 the message is "The file is corrupt..." or something like this, becouse I use Hungarien language Excel.
I don't know why?

Thanks
balogatt

?
